LanguageData.VQE_AncientLabComplex.questDescriptionRu:
questDescription(asker_factionLeader==True)->[asker_nameDef], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name], has intercepted a mysterious broadcast. The signal carries encryption markers associated with an ancient military supersoldier program, and appears to have been transmitted from a site not far from our colony. 

[asker_nameDef] believes that tracking this signal will reveal the location of a hidden installation. On arrival, scouts reported finding a small, abandoned surface outpost with an open vault entrance leading deep underground.

Beneath lies a sealed laboratory complex. Inside must be some kind of ancient broadcasting station - intercepting the signal from it will allow us to trace its destination. 

The underground vault also contains something invaluable: an intact Archogen Injector. This rare device can be used to begin creating supersoldiers by injecting archites directly into human subjects. The injector, along with any other surviving lab equipment, should be claimed and brought back to the colony. 

The lab itself shows no active defenders, but ancient traps may still be functional and must be navigated with care.

questDescription(askerIsNull==True)->We've intercepted an unstable remote broadcast, requesting reinforcements for some unknown event. While seemingly not intended for us, the signal appears to originate from a laboratory responsible for producing ancient supersoldiers. 

The site must contain the broadcasting station responsible for the message. It is imperative that we intercept the broadcast on-site, to track where it is broadcasting to. 

This trek might be dangerous, as we have no way of knowing what lies at the site. Remaining technology at the site could prove useful, we should look at each piece of equipment carefully to take back with us if we dream of creating supersoldiers of our own.
